title: Serena D'italia Golden Mission Table Lamp with Lit Base
features: Mission-style stained glass shade contains pieces of stained glass, each hand-cut and wrapped in fine copper foil
Elegant Cream and Gold colors with jeweled brown accents; Zinc alloy and stained glass lighted base
Works with pull chains and can serve as a nightlight as well.
Base requires one 25-watt bulb and two 60 watt bulbs required for the top
Table lamp stands 23 inches tall x 17 inches in diameter at shade
description: This unique Mission Table Lamp has been handcrafted using methods first developed by Louis Comfort Tiffany.

title: Tiffany Style/Mission Style Table Lamp -- Beautiful, Warm Color
